eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 01:42 PM ON NOV 30, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:42 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Mesa Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Mesa Police Department is looking for 68-year-old Marcos Luna Castillo. He is described as a Hispanic male, 5 feet 5 inches tall, 130 pounds, with brown hair and brown eyes. Marcos was last wearing a dark green puffer jacket, blue jeans, light brown boots, and a hat with a military emblem. Marcos was last seen today at 5:30 AM when he left his residence near Center Street and McKellips Road in Mesa, Arizona. Marcos suffers from several medical condition which may cause him to be lost or easily confused. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
